section.para: Should be autogenerated from the tags.

section.title: f:if
section.para: This view helper implements an if/else condition.

example.title: Basic usage
example.programlisting: <f:if condition="somecondition"> This is being shown in case the condition matches </f:if>
example.para: Everything inside the <f:if> tag is being displayed if the condition evaluates to TRUE.

example.title: If / Then / Else
example.programlisting: <f3:if condition="somecondition"> <f3:then> This is being shown in case the condition matches. </f3:then> <f3:else> This is being displayed in case the condition evaluates to FALSE. </f3:else> </f3:if>
example.para: Everything inside the "then" tag is displayed if the condition evaluates to TRUE. Otherwise, everything inside the "else"-tag is

row.entry: If TRUE, the "then"-part is rendered, otherwise, the "else"-part is rendered
